landing.hero-desc: Say goodbye to printing costs. Update your prices instantly, showcase delicious photos, and let customers see menus via QR code seamlessly.

features.title: WHY CHOOSE MENEX?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to run a modern restaurant
features.desc: Streamline your operations and enhance customer experience with our comprehensive suite of tools.

feature1.title: Easy Menu Builder
feature1.desc: Create items, organize categories, and upload mouth-watering photos in seconds. No coding required.

feature2.title: Real-time Updates
feature2.desc: Run out of a special? Disable it instantly. Need to change a price? Update it everywhere with one click.

feature3.title: Analytics Dashboard
feature3.desc: Track which items are popular, monitor scan rates, and gain insights to optimize your menu profitability.

step1.title: Create Account
step1.desc: Sign up and set up your restaurant profile with basic details and logo.

step2.title: Customize Menus
step2.desc: Add your categories, delicious items, prices, and mouth-watering images.

step3.title: Generate QR
step3.desc: Download your unique QR code, print it for your tables, and start serving!

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose a plan to start building your digital menus instantly.

subscription.successDesc: You're just one step away from transforming your restaurant experience.

footer.desc: The smartest way to manage your restaurant menus. Digital, fast, and eco-friendly.
